name: hair
content:

A1 the mass of thin thread-like structures on the head of a person, or any of these structures that grow out of the skin of a person or animal: He's got short, dark hair.have/get your hair cut I'm going to have/get my hair cut. She brushed her long, red hair. He had lost his hair by the time he was 25. He's starting to get a few grey hairs now. I found a hair in my soup.
